message: Let's make a deal. Take this generous offer while it's still worth it!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This split reflects the time pressure we're both under.
Time is money, Bob. I'm offering a more balanced deal, but my patience (and this deal's value) is dwindling.
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the time pressure.  Let's close this deal and both benefit.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is diminishing, but it's still better than what this will be next round. Let's be done with this!
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it now before inflation erodes your share even further.
